InStem Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Scientist Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 14:51 IST
 Department of Science and Technology
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 56,000 to 56,000




FOLLOW

The Institute of Stem Cell Biology and Regenerative Medicine (InStem) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Scientist-I Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the deadline. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation, Ph D . can apply for the InStem Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Karnataka.

InStem Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Project Scientist-I	01	Post-graduation, Ph.D.

InStem Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 40 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

InStem Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process involves

Written Test.
Interview.

InStem Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

InStem Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 56,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the InStem Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the InStem Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	18-08-2025
Closing date	22-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
